text: hi everyone i am struggling with crm part of HubSpot can some one give me video tutorial to help with how to create custom objects and about workflow and api integration?

Hello <@U05LW2RC94Z>,

We have a video called <https://app.HubSpot.com/academy/l/tracks/1148948/1136518/4807|Building a Custom Object Schema> that should help you with custom objects. You can also create Custom Objects inside of your HubSpot account through the UI.

You can also take the <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/integrating-with-HubSpot-foundations|Integrating With HubSpot I: Foundations> certification to learn more about api integrations.

Hey <@U05LW2RC94Z> I hope this helps you, as much as I know there are three main ways to create objects:
1. using the web UI
2. using postman API
3. using the client (python client, node etc)
You can find most of the details in the following <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/object-settings/create-custom-objects|link>
